mapper.select: SELECT path FROM worklist where work_id = #{work_id};

SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT worklist_name.*, business_id, file_name, count AS version, time, stu_id FROM ( SELECT worklist.*, course.course_name FROM worklist LEFT JOIN course ON worklist.course_id = course.course_id ) AS worklist_name LEFT JOIN ( SELECT *, COUNT(*) AS count FROM upload_history WHERE stu_id = #{stu_id} GROUP BY stu_id, work_id ) AS workgroup ON worklist_name.work_id = workgroup.work_id ) AS single_works );

SELECT tab3.*, course_name FROM ( SELECT worklist.*, sub_count FROM ( SELECT count(stu_id) AS sub_count, tab1.* FROM ( SELECT work_id, file_name, stu_id FROM upload_history GROUP BY work_id, stu_id ) AS tab1 GROUP BY work_id ) AS tab2 RIGHT JOIN worklist ON worklist.work_id = tab2.work_id ) AS tab3 LEFT JOIN course ON course.course_id = tab3.course_id
SELECT version FROM upload_history WHERE stu_id = #{stu_id} AND work_id = #{work_id};
SELECT * FROM upload_history WHERE stu_id = #{stu_id} order by business_id desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO worklist(work_name, course_id, naming_rule, path, deadline, status) VALUES (#{work_name}, #{course_id}, #{naming_rule}, #{path}, #{deadline}, #{status});
INSERT IGNORE INTO upload_history(work_id, file_name, version, stu_id) VALUES (#{work_id}, #{fileName}, #{version}, #{stu_id});
